    • Uses of IsColor in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors

      Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors that implement IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Color
      This class contains information about a color.
      You can requests a specific alpha (starting form source color and cloning it).
      class  GwtMaterialColor
      GWT material color constants.
      class  HtmlColor
      All modern browsers support the following 140 color names.

      IsColor GwtMaterialColor.alpha(double alpha) 
      IsColor Color.alpha(double alpha)
      Clones the color applying the alpha value.
      static IsColor ColorBuilder.build(int r, int g, int b)
      Creates a color using red, green and blue channels.
      static IsColor ColorBuilder.parse(java.lang.String value)
      Returns a color parsing the string value passed as argument.
      It's able to parse HEX, RGB, RGBA and named color representation.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors that return types with arguments of type IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
